details: Developed secure APIs and payload delivery clients using raw sockets and RC4 encryption.
Implemented polymorphic shellcode obfuscation frameworks and custom memory injection routines.
Wrote and analyzed shellcode stubs for buffer overflow exploits and metamorphic payloads.
Automated malware deobfuscation pipelines and data parsing for threat intelligence.
Proficient with Ghidra, IDA Pro, and Radare2 to analyze synthetic malware samples.
Designed and intercepted custom C2 channels, simulated APT behaviors in lab networks.
